attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the government to ensure that DEFRA regulations are strictly adhered to for the importation of live equines from Europe to the UK.

Other information: Currently the equine herd in the UK is being put at risk by the private importation of ill and sub standard equines from unregulated dealers in Europe. These imports are placing UK animals at risk as well as putting additional pressures on UK equine charities. We ask the government to ensure that all equines imported into the UK conform with the Animal Health Act 1981, the Importation of Animals Order 1977 and the Animal and Animal Products regulations 2006.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "make amendments to DEFRA legislation."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21043


Prime Minister's Office
